choice_ids.description: `choice_ids` will only be included in the response if `choices` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

creator_id.description: `creator_id` will only be included in the response if `creator` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

custom_field_set_id.description: `custom_field_set_id` will only be included in the response if `custom_field_set` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

default_text.description:
The placeholder text. This only applies for `'string'`, `'date'`, `'number'` and `'currency'` types.
Visible when whether the custom field is an input field..

name.description: The name of the custom field.

read_access.description: The permission level required to read values for the custom field.

unique_constraint.description:
An optional boolean constraint that forces the custom field value' `value` to be unique across a
`subject_type`. The default is false. This only applies for`'string'`, `'date'`, `'number'`
and `'currency'` types.
Visible when whether the custom field is an input field..

value_type.description:
The type of all custom field values on this field, defaulting to `'string'`. The current types are:
`'string'`, `'date'`, `'number'`, `'currency'`, `'single'`, or `'multi'`.

values_count.description: The number of values associated with the custom field.

write_access.description: The permission level required to create, update, and delete values for the custom field.
